testsuite.name: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 1 Check the Ebay news page visibility

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 2 Check keyword in results search list visibility -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: 2 Check keyword in results search list visibility -- @1.1 Given User opens homePage page ... passed in 0.000s When User makes search by keyword cucumber ... passed in 0.153s And User clicks Search button ... passed in 1.979s Then User checks that each item in results list contains keyword "cucumber" visible ... passed in 1.270s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 3 Check a list of vacuum cleaners in the price range of $150-350 Xiaomi -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: 3 Check a list of vacuum cleaners in the price range of $150-350 Xiaomi -- @1.1 Given User opens homePage page ... passed in 0.000s And User clicks Xiaomi button ... passed in 2.186s And User clicks Vacuum cleaners button ... passed in 1.799s When User clicks Price button ... passed in 0.341s And User selects a price range 150-350 ... passed in 1.740s Then User checks prices in the range 150-350 $ ... passed in 0.905s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 4 Check change view of the search results of vacuum cleaners list

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 5 Check that the incorrect username makes an error message visible -- @1.1

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 6 Check that an incorrect search makes message ‘No exact matches found’ visible -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: 6 Check that an incorrect search makes message ‘No exact matches found’ visible -- @1.1 Given User opens homePage page ... passed in 0.000s When User makes search by keyword asfdsf ... passed in 0.151s And User clicks Search button ... passed in 2.032s Then User checks that message No exact matches found visible ... passed in 0.094s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 7 Check that an incorrect quantity makes message ‘Please enter quantity of 1 or more’ visible

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 8 Check keyword in results search list on Vacuum cleaners page -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: 8 Check keyword in results search list on Vacuum cleaners page -- @1.1 Given User opens homePage page ... passed in 0.000s And User clicks Xiaomi button ... passed in 2.290s And User clicks Vacuum cleaners button ... passed in 1.648s When User in Vacuum cleaners page makes search by keyword vacuum and presses ENTER ... passed in 2.520s Then User checks list items contain Vacuum on Vacuum cleaners page ... passed in 1.509s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: ten_scenatio.Check ten functions of the site
testcase.name: 9 Check error message ‘Please provide a valid price range’ when type text in price range -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: 9 Check error message ‘Please provide a valid price range’ when type text in price range -- @1.1 Given User opens homePage page ... passed in 0.000s When User makes search by keyword cucumber ... passed in 0.153s And User clicks Search button ... passed in 2.510s When User inputs text asd in minimum price field ... passed in 0.281s Then User checks that message "Please provide a valid price range" visible ... passed in 0.060s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
